name: loading-animations-react
description: React component to display a loading animation
author: Michael Joseph Miller <michael.joseph.miller@gmail.com> (https://michael-joseph-miller.github.io/MichaelJosephMiller.github.io/)

scripts.install: cd lib/ && npm i && cd ../demo/ && npm i && cd ../
scripts.start: npm run build:lib && cd demo/ && npm start && cd ../
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:demo
scripts.version:major: npm version major && cd demo/ && npm version major && cd ../lib/ && npm version major && cd ../
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && cd demo/ && npm version minor && cd ../lib/ && npm version minor && cd ../
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && cd demo/ && npm version patch && cd ../lib/ && npm version patch && cd ../
scripts.reset:all: npm run reset:demo && npm run reset:lib && npm run reset
scripts.build:lib: cd lib/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build:demo: cd demo/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.deploy:demo: cd demo/ && npm run deploy && cd ../
scripts.reset:lib: cd lib/ && rm -rf node_modules/ dist/ .parcel-cache/ package-lock.json && cd ../
scripts.reset:demo: cd demo/ && rm -rf node_modules/ dist/ .parcel-cache/ package-lock.json && cd ../
